description: Gets information about a Device Defender detect custom metric. Requires permission to access the DescribeCustomMetric action.

parameters.name: metricName
parameters.description: The name of the custom metric.

nested_items.name: metricName
nested_items.description: The name of the custom metric.

nested_items.name: metricArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Number (ARN) of the custom metric.

nested_items.name: metricType
nested_items.description: The type of the custom metric.

nested_items.name: displayName
nested_items.description: Field represents a friendly name in the console for the custom metric; doesn't have to be unique. Don't use this name as the metric identifier in the device metric report. Can be updated.

nested_items.name: creationDate
nested_items.description: The creation date of the custom metric in milliseconds since epoch.

nested_items.name: lastModifiedDate
nested_items.description: The time the custom metric was last modified in milliseconds since epoch.
